prompt: Photorealistic, wide-angle shot of a Sotheby's appraiser meticulously examining a classical oil painting under diffused natural light from a large window. The painting is on an easel in a brightly lit, modern appraisal room with neutral colors. Focus on the appraiser's hands holding a magnifying glass, revealing the texture and brushstrokes of the artwork. The background subtly shows shelves of art books and appraisal tools. Style: Fine art photography, soft and even lighting. --ar 16:9
name: sotheby-s-art-appraisal-image-1.png

prompt: A dramatic, photorealistic image of a dimly lit Sotheby's vault. The scene is dominated by rows of secured art pieces, partially obscured by soft shadows. In the foreground, a single spotlight illuminates a team of appraisers carefully documenting a recently discovered ancient artifact. Focus on the contrast between light and shadow, highlighting the value and mystery of the hidden collection. Style: Dramatic, high-contrast photography, emphasizing depth and security. --ar 16:9
name: sotheby-s-art-appraisal-image-2.png

prompt: Photorealistic, panoramic view of a Sotheby's auction house during a quiet moment between sales. The vast space is filled with empty chairs facing a brightly lit stage. In the background, a large screen displays a detailed close-up of a valuable diamond necklace. The scene is clean, organized, and reflects the professional atmosphere of the auction house. Style: Architectural photography, emphasizing scale and grandeur, with a focus on detail. --ar 16:9
name: sotheby-s-art-appraisal-image-3.png

prompt: A close-up, photorealistic shot of an appraiser's desk at Sotheby's. The desk is cluttered with documents, magnifying glasses, color charts, and a partially visible antique map. A laptop displays a detailed 3D rendering of a sculpture. The overall composition emphasizes the tools and techniques used in art appraisal. Style: Still life photography, focusing on textures and details, with a shallow depth of field. --ar 16:9
name: sotheby-s-art-appraisal-image-4.png

prompt: Photorealistic image showing a Sotheby's appraiser in a private residence, consulting with a distinguished elderly client. The setting is a well-appointed living room filled with valuable antiques and art. The appraiser is gesturing towards a porcelain vase, explaining its history and value. Soft, ambient light fills the room, creating a sense of trust and expertise. Style: Documentary photography, capturing a moment of interaction and emphasizing the personal aspect of art appraisal. --ar 16:9
